channel.title: Download on amanda.org
channel.description: Recent content in Download on amanda.org

item.title: Patches
item.description: Amanda.org is an open source site. Please refer the TO DO LIST to contribute to this site. The AMANDA Patches Page This page contains a list of important patches to some of the older releases of AMANDA. Please be aware of the fact that the current release of AMANDA is 2.6.1p2 or higher, so think twice about applying some old patch. We, the AMANDA Core Team, strongly recommend to update to the latest stable release !

item.title: _Security
item.description: Amanda.org is an open source site. Please refer the TO DO LIST to contribute to this site. Amanda Security Alert - October 5, 2010 The Amanda development team has discovered a security vulnerability introduced in Amanda-3.1.2. The vulnerability affects both Amanda servers and clients, and could lead to remote execution of code as the Amanda user. The problem is fixed in Amanda-3.1.3, which is released as of October 5, 2010.
